title: The Glass House
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This restaurant is part of the JD Wetherspoon chain (3 locally) This pub has a family friendly dining section. There are leaflets available that provide full nutritional values and contents of all meals. Vegan options may be very limited, only vegan options are jacket potato & beans; side salad (no dressing - just tomato, lettuce & cucumber; chips (if not cooked with other products).
